extendedInfo.description: If you are Little Big Town's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Little Big Town's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Little Big Town's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Little Big Town's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Little Big Town- The Road to Here- A Place to Land- The Reason Why- Tornado-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - A Little More You- A Place To Land- A Thousand Years- All Over Again- All The Way Down- Bones- Boondocks- Bring It On Home- Can't Go Back- Don't Waste My Time- Evangeline- Everything Changes- Fine Line- Fine With Me- Firebird Fly- From This Dream- Front Porch Thing- Fury- Good As Gone- I'm With The Band- Kiss Goodbye- Lean Into It- Leavin' In Your Eyes- Life In A Northern Town- Life Rolls On- Little White Church- Live With Lonesome- Lonely Enough- Looking For A Reason- Lost- Mean Streak- Never Felt Love- Night Owl- Novocaine- On Fire Tonight- Only What You Make Of It- Pavement Ends- Pontiac- Pontoon- Rain On A Tin Roof- Runaway Train- Self Made- Shut Up Train- Sober- Somewhere Far Away- Stay- Still- That's Where I'll Be- The Reason Why- To Know Love- Tornado- Tryin'- Vapor- We Go Together- Welcome To The Family- Why, Oh Why- Wounded- You Canât Have Everything- Your Side Of The Bed
